line_1: That ca's hersel thrity and twa;
line_2: Was jilted by Hab o' the Shaw.

line_1: They drew me thretteen pund an' twa,
line_2: My Pleugh is now thy bairn-time a';

line_1: They drew me thretteen pund an' twa,
line_2: Four gallant brutes, as e'er did draw;

line_1: They drew me thretteen pund an' twa,
line_2: Forby sax mae, I've sell't awa,
